document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of the Quill mites (Acariformes: Syringophilidae) of the World

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of the Quill mites (Acariformes: Syringophilidae) of the World

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Charadriphilus
Bochkov and Chistyakov, 2001
: 297
;
Charadriaulobia , Bochkov et al. 2004 : 136
. Type-species:
Charadriphilus lyudmilae
Bochkov and Chistyakov, 2001
, by original designation.

subSubSection.paragraph:
gallinago (
Bochkov and Mironov, 1998
)
,
Aulobia gallinago
Bochkov and Mironov, 1998
: 8
, figs. 7–11 ;
Charadriaulobia gallinago, Bochkov et al. 2004 : 136
;
Charadriphilus gallinago,
Skoracki et al . 2006
: 61
.
Type material.
Holotype female at ZISP , paratypes : females at ZISP .

Hosts and distribution.
Gallinago gallinago
( type host) ( Charadriiformes : Scolopacidae ), type-locality: FRANCE , St. Malo (
Bochkov & Mironov 1998
).

Type material.
Holotype female at ZISP (T-Sy- 13 ), paratypes at ZISP .

Hosts and distribution.
Scolopax rusticola
( type host) ( Charadriiformes : Scolopacidae ), type-locality: RUSSIA , Leningrad Prov. Tosno Distr. Pogi village (
Bochkov & Chistyakov 2001
). Habitat. Secondary feathers.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
paraguaiae (
Skoracki and Sikora, 2002
)
,
Aulobia paraguaiae
Skoracki and Sikora, 2002
: 5
, figs. 10–13 ;
Charadriaulobia paraguaiae, Bochkov
et al , 2004 : 136 .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Holotype female at AMU , paratypes : females at AMU .

Hosts and distribution.
Gallinago paraguaiae
( type host) ( Charadriiformes : Scolopacidae ), type-locality: ARGENTINA , El Bolson, Rio Negro (
Skoracki & Sikora 2002
).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
vanelli
Bochkov, Fain and Skoracki, 2004
: 136
, figs. 1–6 .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Holotype female at IRSNB (Syr-T- 1 ), paratypes : females, males at IRSNB , ZISP , AMU . Hosts and distribution.
Vanellus chilensis
( Charadriiformes : Charadriidae ). Type-locality: BRAZIL (Bochkov et al . 2004 ).
